sentence.Network_en: My name is Richard Savage, your Lordship.
sentence.Network_cn: 尊敬的阁下，我叫理查德·萨维奇。

sentence.Network_en: His Lordship is away on business.
His lordship will be out of country until next week.
sentence.Network_cn: 大人他下周才从国外回来.

PerfectNetExp.abs: lordly 有气派的lordship 贵族身份lorry 载货汽车
Jude 8 Nevertheless in like manner these dreamers also defile the flesh and despise lordship and revile dignities .犹8然而，这些作梦的人，还是照样玷污肉体，轻慢主治者，毁谤在尊位的。
贵族-的英语翻译-bab.la词典 ... 贵族阶级 peerage 贵族权力 lordship 贵族阶级 noblesse.
所以，贵族(nobility)、领主权(lordship)，即具有了封建主义的意义。等级是生而具来的，是不可改变的。

list.abs: Your lordship is the flower of courtesy ., 阁下真是礼貌的典范.
I knew your lordship would not fail us ., 我知道主教大人是不会让我们失望的.
I knew your lordship would not fail us ., 我知道主教大人是不会让我们失望的.
to confirm your lordship and right to be heard ., 为了明确您的身份和权利.

entry.tran: （对法官、主教和男性贵族的尊称）阁下，大人
entry.def: You use the expressions Your Lordship ,His Lordship, or Their Lordships when you are addressing or referring to a judge, bishop, or male member of the nobility.

example.ex: My name is Richard Savage, your Lordship...
example.tran: 尊敬的阁下，我叫理查德·萨维奇。

example.ex: His Lordship expressed the hope that the Law Commission might look at the subject.
example.tran: 大人表达了他的愿望，希望法律委员会研究一下这一问题。

auth_sentence.content: Parliament had asserted an absolute lordship over the colonies.
auth_sentence.res_content: Parliament had asserted an absolute lordship over the colonies.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Parliament had asserted an absolute lordship over the colonies.

auth_sentence.content: Did his Lordship get it right this week?
